title: ACID in MongoDB
subject: MongoDB
theory: ACID properties ensure valid database transactions. MongoDB guarantees ACID compliance at the single-document level by default. With multi-document transactions, it extends these guarantees across updates.

interview_questions.question: How does MongoDB handle atomicity?
interview_questions.answer: Write operations are atomic on the level of a single document, even if the operation modifies multiple embedded fields.

summary: Understanding guarantees allows developers to write robust data handling logic.
